code: import React from'react';import{Users,Trophy}from'lucide-react';import{TABS}from'../utils/constants';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Tabs=_ref=>{let{activeTab,setActiveTab}=_ref;const tabs=[{id:TABS.MEMBER,label:'MEMBER',shortLabel:'MEM',icon:Users},{id:TABS.MATCH,label:'MATCH',shortLabel:'MAT',icon:Trophy},{id:TABS.RESULT,label:'RESULT',shortLabel:'RES',icon:Trophy},{id:TABS.SCORE,label:'SCORE',shortLabel:'SCO',icon:Trophy}];const getTabColor=tabId=>{const colors={[TABS.MEMBER]:'bg-orange-300',[TABS.MATCH]:'bg-green-300',[TABS.RESULT]:'bg-blue-300',[TABS.SCORE]:'bg-pink-300'};return colors[tabId]||'bg-gray-200';};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-4 bg-white shadow text-xs sm:text-base",children:tabs.map(tab=>{const Icon=tab.icon;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{onClick:()=>setActiveTab(tab.id),className:"py-2 px-1 sm:py-3 sm:px-4 font-semibold ".concat(activeTab===tab.id?getTabColor(tab.id):'bg-gray-200'),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Icon,{className:"inline mr-1 sm:mr-2",size:16}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"hidden sm:inline",children:tab.label}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"sm:hidden",children:tab.shortLabel})]},tab.id);})});};export default Tabs;
